en.title: Check your Answers
en.checkInformation: Check all the information provided and documents uploaded carefully. By Submitting this application you are confirming that you have submitted all the documents required to process the application and the details you have provided is correct.

keys.emailAddress: Contact number of the person named on the application
keys.user-role: Are you named as the applicant on the application form you are submitting?
keys.namedPersonEmail: Email address of the person named on the application
keys.FMPO: Forced Marriage Protection Order - form FL401A
keys.PRSFP: Parental responsibility (second female parent) - form C1
keys.ACG: Appointing a child’s guardian - form C1
keys.CCS: Change of child’s surname or removal from jurisdiction - form C1
keys.forSomeone: I am applying for someone else
keys.emailToNamedPerson: The person named on this application
keys.needHelpWithFees: Do you need help with paying the fee for this application?
keys.hwfReferenceNumber: Enter your help with fees reference number

cy.title: Gwirio eich atebion
cy.checkInformation: Gwiriwch yn ofalus yr holl wybodaeth a ddarparwyd a’r dogfennau sydd wedi’u huwchlwytho. Trwy gyflwyno’r cais hwn, rydych yn cadarnhau eich bod wedi cyflwyno’r holl ddogfennau sydd eu hangen i brosesu’r cais a bod y manylion rydych wedi’u darparu yn gywir.
